name: time|shift
description:
time|shift is a game where you can rewind your previous actions. 

All assets created during the Brackeys 2020.2 game jam by @lhoffl

Controls:

movement - WASD

jump/double jump - space

rewind time - hold shift

Note: Your character will interact with the environment in different ways when rewinding. Your rewind resets only after rewinding, it persists after death.
